knimeNode.name: Container Input (Credentials)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Receives credentials from an external caller (e.g the Call Workflow (Table Based) node).

fullDescription.option: A name for the input parameter(preferably unique). This name is exposed in the REST interface and in the Call Workflow (Table Based) node.
A description for the input parameter. The description is shown in the API specification of the REST interface.
